verses.verse: I commend <S%G4921><s%> to you our sister <S%G79><s%> Phoebe, <S%G5402><s%> who is a servant <S%G1249><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> which is at Cenchrea; <S%G2747><s%>

that you receive <S%G4327><s%> her in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in a manner <S%G516><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> and that you help <S%G3936><s%> her in whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> matter <S%G4229><s%> she may have <S%G5535><s%> need <S%G5535><s%> of you; for she herself <S%G846><s%> has also <S%G2532><s%> been <S%G1096><s%> a helper <S%G4368><s%> of many, <S%G4183><s%> and of myself <S%G1473><s%> as well. <S%G846><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> and Aquila, <S%G207><s%> my fellow <S%G4904><s%> workers <S%G4904><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

who <S%G3748><s%> for my life <S%G5590><s%> risked <S%G5294><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> necks, <S%G5137><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> not only <S%G3441><s%> do I give <S%G2168><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%>

also <S%G2532><s%> [greet <S%G782><s%>] the church <S%G1577><s%> that is in their house. <S%G3624><s%> Greet Epaenetus, <S%G1866><s%> my beloved, <S%G27><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the first <S%G536><s%> convert <S%G536><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> from Asia. <S%G773><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> has worked <S%G2872><s%> hard <S%G4183><s%> for you.

Greet <S%G782><s%> Andronicus <S%G408><s%> and Junias, <S%G2458><s%> my kinsmen, <S%G4773><s%> and my fellow <S%G4869><s%> prisoners, <S%G4869><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> are outstanding <S%G1978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were in Christ <S%G5547><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me.
Greet <S%G782><s%> Ampliatus, <S%G291><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Urbanus, <S%G3773><s%> our fellow <S%G4904><s%> worker <S%G4904><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and Stachys <S%G4720><s%> my beloved. <S%G27><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Apelles, <S%G559><s%> the approved <S%G1384><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are of the [household] of Aristobulus. <S%G711><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Herodion, <S%G2267><s%> my kinsman. <S%G4773><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> of the [household] of Narcissus, <S%G3488><s%> who are in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> Tryphaena <S%G5170><s%> and Tryphosa, <S%G5173><s%> workers <S%G2872><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> Persis <S%G4069><s%> the beloved, <S%G27><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> has worked <S%G2872><s%> hard <S%G4183><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Rufus, <S%G4504><s%> a choice <S%G1588><s%> man <S%G1588><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%> and mine. <S%G1699><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Asyncritus, <S%G799><s%> Phlegon, <S%G5393><s%> Hermes, <S%G2060><s%> Patrobas, <S%G3969><s%> Hermas <S%G2057><s%> and the brethren <S%G80><s%> with them.

Greet <S%G782><s%> Philologus <S%G5378><s%> and Julia, <S%G2456><s%> Nereus <S%G3517><s%> and his sister, <S%G79><s%> and Olympas, <S%G3652><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> who are with them.
Greet <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I urge <S%G3870><s%> you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> keep <S%G4648><s%> your eye <S%G4648><s%> on those <S%G3588><s%> who cause <S%G4160><s%> dissensions <S%G1370><s%> and hindrances <S%G4625><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to the teaching <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you learned, <S%G3129><s%> and turn <S%G1578><s%> away <S%G1578><s%> from them.

For such <S%G5108><s%> men <S%G5108><s%> are slaves, <S%G1398><s%> not of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> but of their own <S%G1438><s%> appetites; <S%G2836><s%> and by their smooth <S%G5542><s%> and flattering <S%G2129><s%> speech <S%G2129><s%> they deceive <S%G1818><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the unsuspecting. <S%G172><s%>

For the report of your obedience <S%G5218><s%> has reached <S%G864><s%> to all; <S%G3956><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> I am rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you, but I want <S%G2309><s%> you to be wise <S%G4680><s%> in what <S%G18><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> and innocent <S%G185><s%> in what <S%G2556><s%> is evil. <S%G2556><s%>

And the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> will soon <S%G5034><s%> crush <S%G4937><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> your feet. <S%G4228><s%> The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> be with you.

Timothy <S%G5095><s%> my fellow <S%G4904><s%> worker <S%G4904><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, and [so do] Lucius <S%G3066><s%> and Jason <S%G2394><s%> and Sosipater, <S%G4989><s%> my kinsmen. <S%G4773><s%>
I, Tertius, <S%G5060><s%> who write <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> letter, <S%G1992><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Gaius, <S%G1050><s%> host <S%G3581><s%> to me and to the whole <S%G3650><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you. Erastus, <S%G2037><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> treasurer <S%G3623><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, and Quartus, <S%G2890><s%> the brother. <S%G80><s%>
[The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>]

Now <S%G1161><s%> to Him who is able <S%G1410><s%> to establish <S%G4741><s%> you according <S%G2596><s%> to my gospel <S%G2098><s%> and the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which has been kept <S%G4601><s%> secret <S%G4601><s%> for long <S%G5550><s%> ages <S%G5550><s%> past,

but now <S%G3568><s%> is manifested, <S%G5319><s%> and by the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4397><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of the eternal <S%G166><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> has been made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> [leading] to obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith; <S%G4102><s%>
to the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
